post.title: Ruqqus: We stand for free speech. Also Ruqqus:

author.bio_html: ping @Spy if i break

body: I did a research paper this summer on this subreddit and there was a published study that found that 74% of autists on Reddit came from 1% of source subreddits. I assume that subs like +DeuxRAMA are the 1%.

post.title: Ruqqus: We stand for free speech. Also Ruqqus:

body:
OCF I saw it coming but they have a warning and mute system in place that they didn't follow.

Another user was constantly posting racist anti jew comments and they did nothing but soft warn him repeatedly.

The 'rules' don't actually prohibit 'holocaust denial', they prohibit 'hate speech'.

Saying that people never died and that Hitler was actually a nice person technically isn't 'hate speech'.
body_html:
OCF I saw it coming but they have a warning and mute system in place that they didn't follow.

Another user was constantly posting racist anti jew comments and they did nothing but soft warn him repeatedly.

The 'rules' don't actually prohibit 'holocaust denial', they prohibit 'hate speech'.

Saying that people never died and that Hitler was actually a nice person technically isn't 'hate speech'.

post.title: Ruqqus: We stand for free speech. Also Ruqqus:

body:
I'm not forcing anyone to read anything I write. Legally based on UK law, there is nothing wrong with anything you write online until it gets put in a private message and sent to someone who has already tried to block you.

You already are literally 50x more annoying than I am at least.
body_html:
I'm not forcing anyone to read anything I write. Legally based on UK law, there is nothing wrong with anything you write online until it gets put in a private message and sent to someone who has already tried to block you.

You already are literally 50x more annoying than I am at least.

post.title: Ruqqus: We stand for free speech. Also Ruqqus:

body: Free speech is great. But there are rights *and* responsibilities, why does everyone forget that? You have a right to say whatever you want, but a responsibility to be engaging or at least entertaining to maintain your right to be heard. If trolling and shit posting is your only schtick, pointless echo chambers already exist on 4chan and Reddit.
body_html: Free speech is great. But there are rights and responsibilities, why does everyone forget that? You have a right to say whatever you want, but a responsibility to be engaging or at least entertaining to maintain your right to be heard. If trolling and shit posting is your only schtick, pointless echo chambers already exist on 4chan and Reddit.

parent.body: Free speech is great. But there are rights *and* responsibilities, why does everyone forget that? You have a right to say whatever you want, but a responsibility to be engaging or at least entertaining to maintain your right to be heard. If trolling and shit posting is your only schtick, pointless echo chambers already exist on 4chan and Reddit.

You have a right to say whatever you want, but a responsibility to be engaging or at least entertaining to maintain your right to be heard. If trolling and shit posting is your only schtick, pointless echo chambers already exist on 4chan and Reddit.

post.title: Ruqqus: We stand for free speech. Also Ruqqus:

body:
It is though because you spend more time there listening to anti ruqqus rhetoric and pay less consideration to people that dont fit into the discord / leftist narrative like me. Most of the influencial users in the discord channel rarely even use this site beyond simply having an account and about 5 months old posts, and all they do is whinge and whine about all the things they see here that they don't like, while making no effort to create the content that they would rather see themselves.

You should have never made a general chat room or anything more than taking general feedback about this site as it literally pulls users away from here.

Poal.co has a very simple chat feature embedded into the site that you should take a look and make something similar here, a single channel chat room would suffice to begin with and you could add more channels as and if demand grows.
body_html:
It is though because you spend more time there listening to anti ruqqus rhetoric and pay less consideration to people that dont fit into the discord / leftist narrative like me. Most of the influencial users in the discord channel rarely even use this site beyond simply having an account and about 5 months old posts, and all they do is whinge and whine about all the things they see here that they don't like, while making no effort to create the content that they would rather see themselves.

You should have never made a general chat room or anything more than taking general feedback about this site as it literally pulls users away from here.

Poal.co has a very simple chat feature embedded into the site that you should take a look and make something similar here, a single channel chat room would suffice to begin with and you could add more channels as and if demand grows.

body: You can declare that on paper as much as you want, but that's exactly how it functions. Plus, why would admins of a free speech site be eager to abuse their power anywhere?
